title: XRP Crashes 40%, Before Recovering, in Biggest One-Day Drop
contentSnippet: The selloff drove price as low as $1.64 before a partial recovery to $2.36, with volumes surging 164% above the 30-day average.

contentSnippet: *本レポートは、X-Bankクリプトアナリストである仮想NISHI（...

title: Crypto sentiment flips to ‘Fear’ as Bitcoin plunges after Trump’s tariffs
contentSnippet: The last time the Crypto Fear & Greed Index dropped to this level of fear, Bitcoin’s price was trading around $80,000.

title: ビットコインの年間の実現純利益が継続的上昇、今後の動向は＝CryptoQuant
contentSnippet: CryptoQuantが週間レポートで仮想通貨ビットコインの利確の動きは低調であるとして今後も上昇継続の可能性を予想した。一方、市場はトランプ関税発言で急落したところだ。

title: Biggest Crypto Liquidation Ever Sees $16B Longs Decimated Amid Market Chaos
contentSnippet: Trump’s 100% tariff warning on China ignited a global sell-off that wiped out $16 billion in leveraged crypto longs and pushed Ethena’s USDe to a rare sub-$1 print.

title: ケニア最大級のスラム街でビットコインが広がる理由｜Afribit創業者インタビュー
contentSnippet: ケニアの貧困地域で広がるビットコイン活用。なぜ使われ、どんな課題があるのか。現地取材による5つの質問と回答で、仮想通貨の実態をわかりやすく紹介。

title: 「トランプ・ショック」でアルト市場に異常値　ATOMが一時0.001ドルまで暴落
contentSnippet: トランプ大統領の対中関税警告で一部アルトコインがバイナンスなどで異常急落。ATOMは0.001ドルまで暴落しSUIは85%下落。過去24時間の清算総額は約3兆円に達した。

title: Bitcoin slump may rebound up to 21% in 7 days if history repeats: Economist
contentSnippet: An economist said Bitcoin declining more than 5% in October is “exceedingly rare,” and historically, the asset has usually rebounded within the following week.

title: ノーベル平和賞めぐる情報漏洩か、ノルウェー当局が米賭けサイトのトレーダーに関する調査＝報道
contentSnippet: ノルウェー当局が2025年ノーベル平和賞の結果についてポリマーケットでの情報漏洩を調査している。受賞者マチャド氏は仮想通貨ビットコインの支持者として知られている。

title: 米賭けサイト「カルシ」、3億ドル調達で評価額50億ドルに　140カ国展開へ
contentSnippet: 米予測市場カルシが3億ドルの資金調達を完了し評価額50億ドルに到達。セコイアやアンドリーセン・ホロウィッツが参加し事業を140カ国に拡大する計画を発表した。

title: Bitcoin may get ‘dragged around a bit’ amid Trump tariff fears: Exec
contentSnippet: Swan Bitcoin CEO Cory Klippsten said Bitcoin's price plunge on Friday was "classic macro whiplash," and Bitcoiners should expect turbulence in the short term.

title: 世界大手銀行10行、G7通貨のステーブルコイン発行を共同検討
contentSnippet: バンカメやゴールドマン・サックスなど世界大手銀行10行がG7通貨連動ステーブルコイン発行の共同検討を開始とBNPパリバが発表した。

title: 32億円相当の仮想通貨を盗難か　Hyperliquidのユーザーが被害者に＝Peckshield
contentSnippet: Peckshieldは、Hyperliquidのユーザーが32億円相当の仮想通貨を盗難されたことを報告。原因は秘密鍵の漏洩であると分析している。

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: キャナリー、XRPとソラナETFの申請を更新も長引く政府閉鎖が影響
contentSnippet: 米キャナリー・キャピタルがXRPとソラナETFの登録届出書を更新し手数料を0.50%に設定。SEC承認に向け前進するも政府閉鎖で承認プロセスが不透明な状況にとどまる。

title: Bitcoin’s Flash Crash Sees $7B Crypto Liquidation as Trump Ramps Up China Trade War
contentSnippet: BTC tumbled 10% on Friday, while ETH, SOL and XRP crashed 15%-30% in a crypto flash crash as trade tensions escalate between the U.S. and China.

title: Bitcoin plummets to $102K on Binance as Trump announces 100% tariffs on China
contentSnippet: Bitcoin plunged to $102,000 in the Binance perpetual futures pair after Trump announced sweeping tariffs on China on Friday, reigniting fears of a broader trade and market sell-off.

title: モルガン・スタンレー、仮想通貨ファンドの顧客制限を撤廃＝報道
contentSnippet: モルガン・スタンレーが仮想通貨ファンドへのアクセス制限を撤廃し全顧客が投資可能にとCNBCが報道。10月15日から退職金口座を含むあらゆる口座で利用可能になる。

title: Institutions set to boost digital asset allocations to 16% by 2028: State Street
contentSnippet: A global survey finds investors are deepening exposure to blockchain and AI, though many remain skeptical that decentralized finance will take over traditional markets.

title: Galaxy Gets $460M Investment by 'Large Asset Manager' for Its HPC Push
contentSnippet: The unnamed investor bought nearly 13 million shares from the company and some executives. The firm intends to use the proceeds to boost its Helios data center project.

title: Bitcoin derivatives scream ‘caution’ despite a week of strong BTC ETF inflows
contentSnippet: Bitcoin struggled to regain momentum as traders stayed cautious, gold hit record highs, and US-China trade tensions fueled a broader market sell-off.

title: Public Keys: BlackRock Bitcoin Fee Frenzy, S&P Catchall and New York Stakes
contentSnippet: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF tops profit charts while Coinbase breaks into NY's staking market. Plus: S&P's new hybrid crypto index.

title: SEC’s ‘future-proofing’ push to shape how much freedom crypto enjoys after Trump
contentSnippet: Could a future US presidential administration undo all of Paul Atkins’ work in a matter of days? Cointelegraph spoke to legal and regulatory experts to find out.

title: Aster Airdrop Delayed Due to 'Data Inconsistencies' With Token Allocations
contentSnippet: Decentralized perps exchange Aster has delayed its airdrop due to issues around token allocations, following complaints from users.

title: Bank of America, Citi and Goldman Sachs Among Banks Exploring Joint Stablecoin
contentSnippet: Top banks including Bank of American, Goldman Sachs, and Citi are exploring issuing a stablecoin, according to a Friday announcement.

title: Crypto Biz: Bitcoin’s corporate moment, ICE’s bold bet, Tether’s expanding footprint
contentSnippet: Bitcoin tops $126,000 as Strategy’s BTC hoard swells; ICE backs Polymarket; Rezolve AI buys Smartpay; Plume gains SEC transfer-agent status.

title: Texas lawmaker behind state’s crypto reserve bill: Ether may be next
contentSnippet: The cryptocurrency with the second-largest market cap was on its way to meeting requirements under Texas' crypto reserve law until a price drop on Friday.

title: Red Uptober? Crypto Liquidations Top $1 Billion as Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana Erase Gains
contentSnippet: So much for "Uptober." Bitcoin plunged Friday while Ethereum and Solana fell to October lows after President Trump's latest tariffs salvo.

title: Polymarket Token Is Coming, But Likely Not This Year: Sources
contentSnippet: Polymarket is focused on re-entering the U.S. market before the prediction market attempts to launch a token.

title: Ether's 7% Plunge Leads Crypto Liquidations in $600M Carnage
contentSnippet: ETH declined the most among the CoinDesk 20 Index, falling twice as far as bitcoin.

title: Hyperliquid User Loses $21 Million Due to Private Key Compromise, Experts Say
contentSnippet: After having their private key leaked, a Hyperliquid user lost $21 million—a painful reminder of the importance of personal security.

title: Don't Buy Bitcoin, Warns UK Investment Giant Hargreaves Lansdown—Here's Why
contentSnippet: British investment platform Hargreaves Lansdown has warned users to stay away from Bitcoin, saying crypto has "no intrinsic value."

title: Nobel Peace Prize Organizers Probing Potential Polymarket Insider Trades
contentSnippet: The odds of the eventual Nobel Peace Prize winner’s victory surged on the prediction market from near-zero to over 70%, several hours before the news was made public.

title: HBAR Tumbles 6% Amid Volume Surge as Wider Market Capitulates
contentSnippet: Traders exit positions as cryptocurrency breaks key technical levels amid broader market uncertainty.

title: On-Chain Investment Funds: Beware of Greeks Bearing Gifts
contentSnippet: Some on-chain investment funds may arrive packaged as “innovation” but conceal higher costs, weaker protections, or unnecessary complexity, Prometheum’s co-CEO Aaron Kaplan argues.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Dive Alongside Stocks as Trump Threatens 'Massive' China Tariffs
contentSnippet: President Trump said Friday that China may face even more severe tariffs, sending Bitcoin and other assets down alongside stock indices.

title: Trump Tariff Threat on China Sends Bitcoin Tumbling Below $119K
contentSnippet: Cryptos came under pressure as a potential U.S.-China trade war once again on the table.

title: Singapore Delays Update to Crypto Rules for Banks Until 2027
contentSnippet: The regulator cited industry feedback to a consultation on the changes, and the need for global alignment on prudential standards.

title: Trump-Linked Firm Looks to Bitcoin Programmability to Build BTC Treasury, ETF Platform
contentSnippet: American Ventures LLC, of which Dominari is a member, made an undisclosed investment in the Hemispheres Foundation, the principal stewards of the Hemi project.

title: Hyped Token Launches Fall Flat as TGE Loses Mojo Ahead of Airdrop Season
contentSnippet: Once a guaranteed pop, new token generation events are now struggling to hold value — with CAMP, XAN and XPL plunging as investor enthusiasm fades and tokenomics weigh heavy.
